thread.title: Pope Francis encourages Ukraine to negotiate with Russia | DW News
thread.title_full: Pope Francis encourages Ukraine to negotiate with Russia | DW News

title: Pope Francis encourages Ukraine to negotiate with Russia | DW News
text: In an interview with a Swiss broadcaster, Pope Francis said Ukraine should have the "courage of the white flag" and negotiate with Russia in order to put an end to the war.
